about_the_game:
Welcome to GoreBox

Dive into the adrenaline-fueled world of GoreBox, an action-packed sandbox game that harmoniously fuses relentless action with unlimited creativity. Here, you're equipped with an extensive array of weapons and explosives, as well as a special piece of equipment that stands out from the rest: the Reality Crusher.

The Reality Crusher: Your Ultimate Tool

The Reality Crusher is a unique tool that enables you to spawn, manipulate, and obliterate any spawnable entity in the game. With this tool, you are the architect of your own chaotic adventures.

Dynamic Interactions and Gameplay Settings

As a player, you share the same damage system as the active, physics-based ragdolls in the game. This shared damage system makes every encounter thrilling, as you balance between creating chaos and protecting yourself.

You also have control over various gameplay settings. Whether it's activating invincibility, turning on noclip, or switching to creator mode (which grants you access to the Reality Crusher), you can tailor the game to your playstyle.

Map Editor and Workshop

With GoreBox's built-in map editor, you're not limited to just playing in the game world - you can create it. Construct custom maps and decorate them with your choice of textures. Then, share your creations through the game's built-in workshop and explore maps from other players.

Express Yourself!

In GoreBox, you can personalize your character with a wide range of customizable skins, armor, and unique accessories like hats and masks. Even the GoreDolls can be styled to your liking, letting you tailor both your character and the world around you to reflect your chaotic vision

Role-Play, Chat, and Trading

Immerse yourself in GoreBox's dynamic world with an extensive range of emotes, text and voice chat system. Customize your character with unique skins, clothing, armor, and hats, or go ragdoll at will. Trade items effortlessly using in-game currency, but be careful—death comes with a cost, as you’ll drop a portion of your money.

Cross-platform Play

One of the unique features of GoreBox is its cross-platform compatibility. Whether you're flying helicopters, orchestrating battles between NPCs, or simply exploring the world with friends, the fun never stops - no matter if you're on Mobile or PC.

The limits are only bound by your imagination. So, what are you waiting for?
Don't forget though, In GoreBox, time won't be the only thing you're killing!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains realistic blood pooling and dismemberment along with semi realistic active ragdolls which react to wounds and scenarios.

short_description: GoreBox is a chaotic physics-driven sandbox where creativity meets destruction. Use the Reality Crusher to spawn, manipulate, and obliterate anything. Customize, battle with friends, roleplay, or face devious creatures. In this world, your imagination rules—and chaos is your playground!
